Text.val: 23.07.2012 GB SCR17456 Extended condition of selection when CLMS rows are deleted
21.02.2012 GB SCR17132 Extended selection with ADMN_SUPPLYCHAINFINANCE = N
17.05.2011 SH SCR16448 Replaced GNRL_CURRENCY by ADMN_CURRENCY
04.08.2010 GB SCR15694 Changed the part Initialization when "delete MQDT rows" is call
28.06.2010 GB SCR15617 Changed condition for selection
10.06.2010 GB SCR15574 Extended condition of selection
01.06.2010 SH SCR15564 Fixed bug in task "Selection" where 'FLTEST' was hardcode as database
-- Only if PI.DEBTORSELECTION = Y or blank then perform BCM011DEBTOR

SQL_STMT_U.val: select A.CLNT101_ADMNO, A.CLNT102_CLNTNO, A.CLNT104_LEGAL_ADMNO, A.CLNT104_LEGAL_CLNTNO, A.CLNT110_NAME1, A.CLNT203_OFFICE, A.CLNT906_STATUSCONTRACT, A.CLNT803_CONTRACTSTARTDATE, A.CLNT803_CONTRACTTERMDATE, A.CLNT402_ADVANCE, A.CLNT212_INTERCREDIT, A.CLNT201_LANGUAGE from :1/CLNT A, :1/ADMN where A.CLNT906_STATUSCONTRACT = 1 and A.CLNT212_FCI = 0 and A.CLNT102_CLNTNO <> 99999 and (A.CLNT803_CONTRACTTERMDATE is null or A.CLNT803_CONTRACTTERMDATE > ':2') and A.CLNT104_LEGAL_ADMNO = A.CLNT101_ADMNO and A.CLNT104_LEGAL_CLNTNO = A.CLNT102_CLNTNO and :3 and exists (select * from :1/CLNT B where B.CLNT104_LEGAL_ADMNO = A.CLNT104_LEGAL_ADMNO and B.CLNT104_LEGAL_CLNTNO = A.CLNT104_LEGAL_CLNTNO and B.CLNT402_ADVANCE > 0 and B.CLNT407_FINANCECODE <> 'S') and ADMN_NO = A.CLNT101_ADMNO and ADMN_DELCREDERE = 'N' and ADMN_COUNTCREDITLIMITS = 'Y' and ADMN_ENDCLIENTS = 'N' and ADMN_SUPPLYCHAINFINANCE = 'N' and (select cast (sum (CMON_CURRBALINVESTMENT) as decimal (13,2)) from :1/CLNT C, :1/CMON where C.CLNT104_LEGAL_ADMNO = A.CLNT101_ADMNO and C.CLNT104_LEGAL_CLNTNO = A.CLNT102_CLNTNO and CMON_YEAR = :4 and CMON_MONTH = :5 and CMON_CURRENCY= ADMN_CURRENCY and CMON_ADMNO = C.CLNT101_ADMNO and CMON_CLNTNO = C.CLNT102_CLNTNO) > cast (:6/100 as decimal (13,2)) for fetch only
